item.title: Cant use ::setlevel with items on and in wild
item.dc:creator: @ServerPKisfun ServerPKisfun
item.description:
@ServerPKisfun wrote:

Title says it all folks. The code works fine i just dont want players to do it while items on and in pvp. Need some help. Its 317 Delta and heres the code please post helpful comments.

[code=java]if (command.startsWith(“setlevel”)) {
String[] args = command.split(" ");

if(args.length == 3) {
int skillID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int level = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
playerXP[skillID] = getXPForLevel(level);
playerLevel[skillID] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[skillID]);
refreshSkills();
addSkillXP(1, 0);
addSkillXP(1, 1);
addSkillXP(1, 2);
addSkillXP(1, 3);
addSkillXP(1, 4);
addSkillXP(1, 5);
addSkillXP(1, 6);
addSkillXP(1, 7);
addSkillXP(1, 8);
addSkillXP(1, 9);
addSkillXP(1, 10);
addSkillXP(1, 11);
addSkillXP(1, 12);
addSkillXP(1, 13);
addSkillXP(1, 14);
addSkillXP(1, 15);
addSkillXP(1, 16);
addSkillXP(1, 17);
addSkillXP(1,18);
addSkillXP(1, 19);
addSkillXP(1, 20);

sM(“You have successfully changed your level to your desired liking.”);
} else {
sM(“Invalid format, use as - ::setlevel SKILLID LEVEL”);
}
}
[/code]

Read full topic
